dict.acceptation: 与（某人）离婚，判（某人）离婚；

sent.orig: The traditional divorce system consists of divorce compensation, economic help and remedy for divorce etc.
sent.trans: 传统的离婚救济制度包括离婚损害赔偿、离婚扶养费、离因补偿、离婚经济帮助等等形式。

sent.orig: Did Mr Hill divorce his wife or did she divorce him?
sent.trans: 是希尔先生要和他太太离婚，还是他太太要和他离婚呢？

sent.orig: Compensation system of divorce damage is an important part of divorce legal institutions.
sent.trans: 离婚损害赔偿制度是离婚法律制度的重要组成部分。

sent.orig: Jesus instructs his followers( Christians): do not divorce. Divorce breaks the marriage.
sent.trans: 耶稣教导祂的门徒（督徒）﹕可离婚。离婚乃将婚约破除。

sent.orig: With a wife to divorce, Pavarotti not balk at paying the high costs of divorce.
sent.trans: 为了跟发妻离婚，帕瓦罗蒂不惜付出高额的离婚费。
